meta.description: Active Gym is your ally for efficient and centralized gym management. We offer membership tracking, access control, scheduled activities, and much more.
meta.keywords: Active Gym, gym, memberships, fitness activities, access control, gym management, gym software
meta.author: Active Gym Team
meta.ogDescription: Optimize your gym management with Active Gym. Discover tools for user, activity, and access control.

slide1.imageAlt: Treadmills in a gym and a man running on one
slide1.title: Achieve Your Goals at Active Gym
slide1.description: Enjoy a pleasant environment for your workouts

slide2.imageAlt: Weight plates and clamps on the floor
slide2.title: High-Quality Equipment
slide2.description: We offer state-of-the-art equipment to take your training to the next level

slide3.imageAlt: A woman assisting a man doing push-ups in a gym
slide3.title: Personalized Training
slide3.description: Get personalized plans to achieve your goals faster*
slide3.asterisk: * Benefits may vary depending on the plan purchased,

slide4.imageAlt: A woman and a man in a gym using battle ropes
slide4.title: Group Classes
slide4.description: Enjoy group classes included in your plan with trained instructors

slide5.imageAlt: A barbell and various training equipment
slide5.title: Multipurpose Spaces
slide5.description: We have spaces for all goals: crossfit, spinning, boxing, TRX, and more

changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.message: You are about to change your password. Please enter the requested fields:
changePassword.atLeast8Characters: Password must be at least 8 characters long
changePassword.pattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number

admin.title: Change User Password
admin.message: As an administrator, you can change the password of any user in the system.

analytics.tooltip: The filter selection applies only to this month's sales, earnings, and top-selling memberships.

gymConfig.title: Your Gym Configuration
gymConfig.description: Below you can view and change some administrative aspects of your gym:
gymConfig.others: Your advisors, trainers, and support staff
gymConfig.membershipTypesDescription: Below you will see the memberships as they appear on your homepage. You can choose whether the membership is available for sale or not:
gymConfig.gymStaffDescription: In this section, you can view how your team is structured. You can edit the roles of associated users.

typeForm.featurePlaceholder: Enter a feature without special characters
